website_summaries.verdict: A tried and trusted cream that aims to lift, firm, and smooth hips and thighs.
pros: Made from eight plant extracts, including quince leaf, this cream has a tingling cooling effect which is refreshing
Works well to improve the appearance of lumps and bumps
Some users also found good results using it on stretchmarks
Results improve when massaging the cream in, and with consistent use
cons: You need to use a lot of it, and it’s very heavily perfumed

customer_reviews.title: EXTREMELY SATISFIED
customer_reviews.text: As someone who works out on a daily basis but still has cellulite because let’s face it - nobody’s perfect - this product does work! PLEASE NOTE: like anything, you have to apply it daily! Nothing works after just one use. In about a week, I noticed enough of a difference to know that this does work! Since then, the results have just gotten better. It’s a nice easy smell and NOT greasy! For best results, use it with a cellulite/fascia roller.
customer_reviews.author: Manda L. H.

customer_reviews.title: Want refund
customer_reviews.text: I used twice a day for a month. No result. I think it was fake :/
customer_reviews.author: Advil

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: It works, I’m using for a month and I can see some reduction in my cellulites, it’s not a miracle but was the only cream that I used that actually worked. Love the smell. It has little cooling sensation right after you apply, but it’s not bad and just for a while. I will keep using.
customer_reviews.author: Josie W.

customer_reviews.title: It helps
customer_reviews.text: I think this works, but I use it with a red light massager. It won't work miracles, but I do notice a slight improvement.
customer_reviews.author: melinurse

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best product for cellulite. I noticed a difference in just one week of using it
customer_reviews.author: Bernice

customer_reviews.title: will not buy again.. too expensive
customer_reviews.text: I buy a lot of clarins products but this is one i was very disappointed in. I didn't expect miracles but there was no difference in the texture of my skin and I couldn't afford using it for 3 more months to see if there were any better results.
customer_reviews.author: Aglay G. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Where you're health is at
customer_reviews.text: I use this product for cellulite and I used it every day and for as much as it cost it didn't work well it all I'm very dissatisfied with this product I'll never buy it again wish I could get my money back
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Just great
customer_reviews.text: Love it, third bottle I am using several years in a row. Clarins is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: OS

customer_reviews.title: Tempered product.
customer_reviews.text: The box looked like it was opened but I thought maybe it was the shipping that roughed it up a bit. As you can see by the pictures, the seal was definitely broke. And when I opened the lid, the product was looked used. Not happy about this at all.
customer_reviews.author: Mayra Hurtado

customer_reviews.title: Read Ingredients before purchasing
customer_reviews.text: Gave my mother a skin rash! Some people might be allergic to some of the ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Light texture and nice menthol smell 👍
customer_reviews.author: Viktoriia

customer_reviews.title: Very good cream!
customer_reviews.text: This cream really works! Among all the others I tried these years, this one is for sure the best in the market!
customer_reviews.author: Alessandra

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I like it so much it has a good smell and very affective..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly smooth !!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product already an it’s only been two weeks I see the difference !!!
customer_reviews.author: Candice Holley

customer_reviews.title: not sure yet if the progress is worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice lotion, not sure if I'd purchase again just because it is so expensive. I have noticed a slight difference, it works, but not sure yet if the progress is worth the cost. I exercise on a daily basis and have a fairly good diet, thinking that this is a great starting tool to help even out problem areas, but don't think I'll need continuous use. I use it once a day in the morning post workout and shower, I follow the applying techniques shown in the video. Best of Luck! It smells amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Lena

customer_reviews.title: Old
customer_reviews.text: Came in Open old package , I threw out! Iwill never order from a 3rd party vrr e adorable ahain
customer_reviews.author: Dr

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not sure I have seen any results but I will use the entire bottle
customer_reviews.author: Lynette S.

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for 3 weeks now and I DO see and feel a difference! It's not going to get rid of your cellulite 100%, but a 50% reduction in the appearance sure is nice....I'll take any improvement I can get! It really does smooth things out and tighten.
customer_reviews.author: UniqueMonique

customer_reviews.title: You won’t be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product! I used it for the first time and felt a difference in my legs! Thinner and smoother! Definitely works on diminishing cellulite and drink water throughout the day it helps a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Feels cool, but does it really get rid of cellulite?
customer_reviews.text: The texture and smell were pleasant, but with any cellulite cream I can't say I really noticed a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome. I have used it for years...it really does work👍🏻👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Messina

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I spent a lot of time researching this product, as well as other, similar products. I run and lift weights 5-6 times a week, and I am at my goal weight, but still need help with the skin on my legs. This product does not make any difference. However, Nivea Anti-Cellulite serum- for just $13 makes a noticeable difference.
customer_reviews.author: M. Andrade

customer_reviews.title: Half price on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I’m mad because I just paid $71.00 for this product at Ulta and then found it here for $36!! Lol regardless of that though, I really do like it. It feels very refreshing and it’s a great moisturizer. I’m not sure how it’s going to work for cellulite because I’ve been using it less than a week. I’m sure it’s going to take some time to see results....but next time I’ll buy it here for half the price!
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

product_meta.title: Clarins Body Fit Anti-Cellulite Contouring Expert, 6.9 Oz, Pack of 1
feature_bullets: Features a refreshing cream-gel texture for instant absorption
Formulated with Quince Leaf extract to reduce the look of cellulite
Provides targeted body refining and reshaping actions
